Pre-Game Insights: The Brooklyn Nets were facing the NBA's lone unbeaten team.
Key Match Events: The Nets led by seven with just over four minutes remaining in the contest but couldn't escape with the win.
Post-Match Reflections: Brooklyn's rookie head coach, Jordi Fernandez, took responsibility for the collapse.
Others: The Nets' next game is against the Zion Williamson-less New Orleans Pelicans on Monday at 8 p.m. EST.
